product_name: The North Face  Borealis Pack - Women's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Offering women-specific performance and serving double duty as a school bag or briefcase, The North Face Borealis Pack has formfitting shoulder straps and a comfortale hipbelt and back panel.
short_description: Offering women-specific performance and serving double duty as a school bag or briefcase, The North Face Borealis Pack has formfitting shoulder straps and a comfortale hipbelt and back panel.
